ROW.Name_Event: Restoration of the chapel of San Secondo
ROW.Synopsis: The chapel and the coffer with the relics of San Secondo are restored thanks to the financial support of the Patriarch Giovanni Trevisan, the Bishop of Vicenza Matteo Priuli, and the nuns of the Corpus Domini. The chest is made in carved and gold-plated marble, while a crystal glass protected the front of the coffer.
